Articles.Content:
KSP logHey has anyone else had this issue? I'm using MechJeb 2.5.7 and the MJ pork chop for a Eloo to Kerbin interplanetary transfer is showing zero intercept opportunity's, it's completely red and does not display a delta v amount for any point on the graph. First I thought it was because the planet needed to get to a better position, but idk that seems unlikely since every other planet had a working porkchop plot, and after a few years it still did not change.

Interestingly, it will display a viable porkchop plot for every other planet. Kerbin is the only one showing a completely red "--/-- Dv" plot

I'm posting here because the operator for the MJ forum thread closed it because some people were posting the same question over again. Here is my KSP log file if anyone wants a look

Edited May 7, 2016 by fireblade274
